hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.immutable

Class ImmutableMatrixFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.immutable.ImmutableMatrixFactory

  • public final class ImmutableMatrixFactory
extends Object
    Factory for creating immutable matrices.
    Author:
    Kazó Csaba

      • createMatrix

        public static ImmutableMatrix createMatrix(double[][] elements)
        Creates an immutable matrix with its elements taken from an array. The parameter should be a double[r][c] array with r>0 and c>0. The matrix element at row row and column col will be elements[row][col].
        Parameters:
        elements - the array containing the elements of the matrix
        Returns:
        the new matrix
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the array is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the dimensions of the array are not valid

      • zeros

        public static ImmutableMatrix zeros(int rows,
                    int cols)
        Returns an immutable matrix of the specified size whose elements are all 0.
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows
        cols - the number of columns
        Returns:
        a rows×cols matrix whose elements are all 0
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either argument is non-positive

      • ones

        public static ImmutableMatrix ones(int rows,
                   int cols)
        Returns an immutable matrix of the specified size whose elements are all 1.
        Parameters:
        rows - the number of rows
        cols - the number of columns
        Returns:
        a rows×cols matrix whose elements are all 1
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either argument is non-positive

      • identity

        public static ImmutableMatrix identity(int size)
        Returns an immutable identity matrix of the specified dimension.
        Parameters:
        size - the dimension of the matrix
        Returns:
        a size×size identity matrix
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the size is not positive
